alert.note: Alert for Gibson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 10:58AM EST until March 01 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Patoka River near Princeton. .Recent rainfall continues to cause rises on the Patoka River. The river is expected to crest at Princeton this weekend. For the Patoka River...including Princeton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Patoka River near Princeton. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 17.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday morning to a crest of 18.3 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
